Uses of Class
org.apache.xpath.patterns.StepPattern

  • Packages that use StepPattern 
    Package Description
    org.apache.xpath
    Implementation of XPath; for the most part, only classes meant for public use are found at this root level of the XPath packages.
    org.apache.xpath.patterns
    Implementation of XPath nodeTest support, and XSLT pattern matching support.

    • Uses of StepPattern in org.apache.xpath

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Visit a match pattern.

      Special context node pattern matcher.
      class  FunctionPattern
      Match pattern step that contains a function.
